channel.title: Posts on ttauveron's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ttauveron's blog

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hello world! My name is Thibaut Tauveron, I work in software engineering, broadly speaking. I’m specialized in DevOps practices and I like hacking around with various techs. I decided to start a blog in order to document my learnings and talk about things I’m interested in, engineering being my main focus. Hope this blog can inspire some readers!
